markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dig Up Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=2838) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shisk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=382" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are an endless well of knowledge and can remember several vital pieces of information at once. You can cast [_hypercognition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=156) as an innate occult spell once per day.
name: Dig Up Secrets
